layout.title: Review Automation
layout.description: Complete reputation management for spas and massage businesses. Get more reviews, respond professionally, and monitor your online reputation across all platforms automatically.

hero.title: Get The Reviews Your Thai Massage Business Deserves
hero.text: Our system automatically requests reviews from happy clients, sends reminders, and builds your online reputation. More 5-star reviews mean more customers finding you.

services.title: More Customers, Higher Rankings, Zero Manual Work

items.title: Win More Customers Through Social Proof
items.text: People trust businesses with dozens of 5-star reviews—making you the obvious choice over competitors with fewer or older reviews. Strong reviews convert website visitors into booked appointments automatically.

items.title: Rank Higher on Google Search Results
items.text: More reviews boost your local search rankings dramatically. When customers search "Thai massage near me," you appear at the top—capturing customers before they even see your competitors.

items.title: Stop Manually Chasing Reviews
items.text: No more awkward "please leave a review" conversations after every appointment. The system handles everything automatically—you focus on treatments while your reputation builds itself.

reviews.title: How Reputation Management Transformed These Businesses

items.text: We went from 12 Google reviews to 147 in just 6 months! Our average rating went from 4.2 to 4.9 stars. New customers constantly mention they chose us because of our excellent reviews. The system makes it so easy - it's completely automated.
items.name: Sophie Turner
items.title: Owner, Serenity Thai Spa

items.text: The review responses alone are worth it. Every review gets a professional, personalised response within hours. We've turned several negative reviews into repeat customers because of how well the responses were handled. Our bookings have increased 40% since we started.
items.name: Daniel Cooper
items.title: Manager, Urban Wellness Centre

features.title: Everything You Need to Build an Unbeatable Reputation
features.text: Our reputation management system doesn't just collect reviews - it actively builds your reputation, protects your business from negative feedback, and turns your satisfied customers into your best marketing channel.

items.title: Automated Review Request Sequences
items.text: Sends perfectly timed review requests via SMS and email after appointments, with smart follow-up reminders. Proven timing and multi-channel delivery get 5-10x more reviews than asking once.

items.title: AI-Powered Positive Review Responses
items.text: Every positive review gets a personalized, professional response within hours. AI crafts genuine thank-you messages using the reviewer's name and specific details—building loyalty and showing you care.

items.title: Automatic Facebook Review Sharing
items.text: New 5-star Google reviews automatically post to your Facebook page as social proof. Amplify positive feedback across platforms—reaching more potential customers without any manual posting work.

items.title: Review Filtering & Feedback System
items.text: Checks customer satisfaction before directing them to Google. Unhappy customers provide private feedback instead—protecting your public rating while giving you opportunities to resolve issues before they go public.

items.title: Expert Negative Review Response Help
items.text: Professional guidance on crafting responses to negative reviews that address concerns and demonstrate care. We help you turn difficult situations into opportunities—showing potential customers how well you handle issues.

cta.title: Start Building Your 5-Star Reputation
cta.text: Let's talk about growing your Google reviews and show you exactly how the system works.
